description: Gets information about the specified monitor.

parameters.name: monitorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the monitor. This ID is returned by the CreateMonitor operation.

nested_items.name: monitorId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the monitor.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The name used to identify the monitor on the Deadline Cloud console.

nested_items.name: subdomain
nested_items.description: The subdomain used for the monitor URL. The full URL of the monitor is subdomain.Region.deadlinecloud.amazonaws.com.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The complete URL of the monitor. The full URL of the monitor is subdomain.Region.deadlinecloud.amazonaws.com.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role for the monitor. Users of the monitor use this role to access Deadline Cloud resources.

nested_items.name: identityCenterInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM Identity Center instance responsible for authenticating monitor users.

nested_items.name: identityCenterApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that the IAM Identity Center assigned to the monitor when it was created.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The UNIX timestamp of the date and time that the monitor was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user name of the person that created the monitor.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The UNIX timestamp of the last date and time that the monitor was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user name of the person that last updated the monitor.
